title: My Curse and Cure
lyrics:
Break down
I feel all broken down
Break down
I feel like I've broken down
These broken bones

They hold me up

I put one foot in front of the other

But it takes everything I've got

Even though

I don't wanna feel the pain anymore

Now I know

I am not who I was before

So while it comes and goes

There's always more in store

And there it is



My curse and cure

My curse and cure

My curse and cure



I'm ready

For the come and go

I'm ready

'Cause now I know

More each day

More each day

There's somethin' inside

Take my burdens away



Break down

My heart keeps breakin' down

Break down

My heart feels broken down

But there's still a heart

There's still the truth

Even in a million pieces

It gets me through

Even though

I don't wanna feel the pain anymore

Now I know

I am not who I was before

So while it comes and goes

There's always more in store

And there it is



My curse and cure

My curse and cure

My curse and cure



I'm ready

For the come and go

I'm ready

'Cause now I know

More each day

More each day

There's somethin' inside

Take my burdens away



I'm ready

For the come and go

I'm ready

'Cause now I know



More each day

More each day

There's somethin' inside

Take my burdens away



This broken spirit

It's in your hands

This broken spirit

It's in your hands

In your hands



It's in your hands

It's in your hands
